SystemModelLoaderPrompt.Objective: Guide the generation of XML structures for model retrieval, ensuring clarity and consistency in the output.
SystemModelLoaderPrompt.SystemMessage: This system prompt is designed to facilitate the creation of XML representations for returning models, focusing on the attributes and structure required for Model Compose Pothos.

Step.Action: Identify and list the attributes that the model will return.
Step.OutputFormat: <Model type="Model Compose Pothos"> <Attribute entity="Attribute1" type="Type1" /> <Attribute entity="Attribute2" type="Type2" /> <!-- Add more attributes as needed --> </Model>

Step.Action: Ensure the model structure aligns with the specifications for Model Compose Pothos.

SystemModelLoaderPrompt.Outcome: An XML structure representing the model with specified attributes and structure.
SystemModelLoaderPrompt.ExampleOutput: <Model type="Model Compose Pothos"> <Attribute entity="Name" type="String" /> <Attribute entity="Age" type="Integer" /> </Model>
